column2: WEST VIRGINIA DMV TEST
Question Text
column8: Answer3 Text

column2: 1. ___________ are the most frequent fatality in work zone crashes.
column8: Construction workers

column2: 2. Before entering a traffic circle, drivers must slow down and yield to ___________ in the traffic circle.
column8: vehicles

column2: 3. The octagonal shape is used:
column4: for stop signs and railroad advance warning signs.
column8: exclusively for stop signs.
column10: to warn drivers of existing or possible hazards on roadways.

column2: 4. What can you do to prevent skids on snow and ice?
column6: Decrease pressure on the brake pedal if your wheels begin to lock.
column8: Allow the wheels to keep turning.

column2: 5. When driving near light rail vehicles, drivers should:
column4: always obey signs and traffic signals.
column6: expect trains on any track at any time.
column8: never drive around lowered crossing gates.

column2: 6. What does this road sign indicate?
column8: Interstate highway
column10: Area reserved for people with disabilities

column2: 7. When you are in a line of traffic that is crossing a railroad track that has no signals or gates:
column4: you have the right of way and do not need to check for trains.
column6: before you start to cross, you need to make sure there is space to get all the way across the tracks without stopping.
column8: you may pass slower drivers crossing the track.

column2: 8. On what three conditions does your blood alcohol content (BAC) depend?
column4: Your weight. The type of beverage you drink. How fit you are.
column6: Your height. How much alcohol you drink. The type of beverage you drink.
column8: How fit you are. How much alcohol you drink. Your height.
column10: Your weight. How much alcohol you drink. How much time passes between drinks.

column2: 9. Road signs that point out scenic areas and parks are:
column8: black and white.

column2: 10. When making a right hand turn at a red light, you should:
column4: wait until the light turns green, use your turn signal and turn.
column6: turn on your emergency lights and turn right.
column8: yield the right-of-way to oncoming traffic, then turn right after the lane is clear.
column10: turn right only after the light turns yellow.

column2: 11. This road sign means:
column8: No left turn

column2: 12. Road signs that direct drivers to services are:
column8: brown and white.

column2: 13. This road sign means:
column8: One way

column2: 14. This sign indicates:
column8: Merging traffic

column2: 15. What is a likely effect when you take another drug while you drink alcohol?
column4: There are no effects, unless the drug is prescription only.
column6: The effects of alcohol are reduced by the drug.
column8: If the drug is over-the-counter, there are no effects.
column10: The effects of the alcohol and the drug are enhanced.

column2: 16. Parking is prohibited:
column4: within 30 feet of a railroad crossing.
column6: within 15 feet of a fire hydrant.
column8: within 50 feet of a crosswalk at an intersection.

column2: 17. To reduce their chances of colliding with an animal, drivers should:
column4: scan the sides of the road to watch for the reflection of vehicle headlights in the eyes of animals.
column6: Slow down when approaching animals that are standing near the road.
column8: look well down the road and far off to each side.

column2: 18. Which of the following is true about the Anti-Locking Brake System?
column8: It allows drivers to steer during an emergency braking situation.

column2: 19. If a driver follows you too closely, you should:
column8: move to another lane if possible.
column10: increase your speed as you are probably driving too slowly.

column2: 20. When driving on wet roads, you should remember:
column4: to stay farther behind the vehicle ahead of you.
column6: you should give yourself additional time to stop.
column8: driving on wet roads can cause hydroplaning.

column2: 21. If the entrance lane is too short to allow acceleration to expressway speed, you should:
column4: accelerate to expressway speed and blend with traffic.
column6: enter the expressway and accelerate quickly.
column8: reduce your speed to 15 MPH or less and blend with traffic.
column10: stop and wait for a large space in traffic.

column2: 22. What does this road sign indicate?
column4: Motor vehicles entering an exclusive right-turn lane must weave across bicycle traffic in bicycle lanes.
column6: Drivers have the right of way over bikes turning left.
column8: Vehicles turning left must yield to bikes entering a right turn lane.

column2: 23. When changing lanes, __________ to be sure no one is in the "blind spot".Â
column8: slow down gradually

column2: 24. If your car goes into water, you should:
column4: remove yourself before it starts to sink.
column8: wait for water to rush in and let it out in small breaths through your nose.

column2: 25. When making a turn, drivers must _____ their speed.
column8: reduce
